ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The Blazing Fire will be displayed to the misled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Hell made visible to those who had gone astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and the Fire will be uncovered for those who strayed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: the pious and hell will be left open for the rebellious ones
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And hell will be revealed for the astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the (Hell) Fire will be placed in full view of the astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the hell shall be made manifest to the erring ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and Hell advanced for the perverse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And hell will appear plainly to the erring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and Hell shall be revealed to the misguided,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Fierce Fire shall be made apparent unto the seduced ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and hell will be brought into view for the perverse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And to those straying in Evil, the Fire will be placed in full view;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the (Hell) Fire will be placed in full view of the erring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Hell is brought near to the perverse'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the Blaze will be displayed to the deviators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Hellfire will be brought forth for the deviators,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:91] and Hell will be revealed [plainly] for the perverse, the disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And hell will appear plainly to the erring) to the disbelievers, becoming thus their abode.
